name: Covanta Holding Corporation
description: Covanta Holding Corporation is a leader in sustainable waste management and renewable energy generation. Established in 1980, Covanta specializes in the conversion of waste into clean, renewable energy, significantly reducing landfill waste while generating electricity. The company's innovative Waste-to-Energy (WtE) facilities play a crucial role in the circular economy by converting municipal solid waste into steam and electricity, which is then supplied to local utility grids. Covanta operates a network of facilities across North America and Europe, utilizing advanced technologies that minimize emissions and maximize energy recovery. With a strong commitment to environmental sustainability, Covanta is actively involved in recycling initiatives and offers services that help communities manage their waste responsibly. The company aims to create a sustainable future by transforming waste into a resource, thereby contributing to a reduction in greenhouse gas emissions and the preservation of natural resources. Covanta's mission is to provide effective waste management solutions that protect the environment while delivering economic benefits to the communities it serves.
